issue.title: [Archery] Benchmark diff should provide a TUI friendly output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6828](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6828). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The goal is to provide a format similar to ursabot markdown comment:

 

- Filter only change diff (ignore small deltas)
- Colors on success/failure
- Tabulated
